title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.14 - Joint fiduciaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.14 - Joint fiduciaries

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 651(f)

If two or more fiduciaries are acting jointly for any
individual under disability or for any estate or trust, the New York State
fiduciary income tax return required by section
151.12
or
151.13
of this

Part may be made and filed by any one of them. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
151.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
